text: Andrew Ilie was the defending champion but lost in the quarterfinals to Xavier Malisse. Andy Roddick won in the final 6-2, 6-4 against Malisse, earning the first title of his career. ==Seeds== A champion seed is indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which that seed was eliminated. # Andre Agassi (First Round) # Todd Martin (Second Round) # Michael Chang (Second Round) # Rainer Schüttler (Second Round) # Andrew Ilie (Quarterfinals) # Jérôme Golmard (Semifinals) # Olivier Rochus (First Round) # Magnus Gustafsson (Second Round) ==Draw== ==External links== * 2001 Verizon Tennis Challenge Draw Category:Verizon Tennis Challenge Category:2001 ATP Tour
title: 2001 Verizon Tennis Challenge – Singles
